name: Northeast Helicopters Flight Services, LLC
about: Northeast Helicopters Flight Services, LLC, although now operating as HTX Helicopters, has a rich history as one of the oldest and most reputable helicopter schools in the United States. Established in 1974, the school has been a cornerstone in the aviation community, offering a wide range of helicopter and aviation services. These include initial helicopter training, advanced and instrument training, and certification programs under FAA Part 141 regulations. The school boasts a team of experienced instructors, all of whom are CFIIs, and a state-of-the-art maintenance department. Northeast Helicopters has strong relationships with tour operators and employers, providing graduates with numerous career opportunities. With a commitment to safety, professionalism, and customer satisfaction, the school has been a launching pad for many successful helicopter pilots.
